Translations.Text: Wid ipnamaren af Oebbi, deffir wagwav n loawab $uosen, ur teswi nnmara nnsen, ar Mass nnsen. Fellasen zzaaf, fellasen aaaqeb uqsie
Oebbi id Issadren Tazmamt, s tidep, akked lmizan. W ad ak imlen, ahat imir iqeob ed
Earen $uoes wid ur numin ara yis. Ma d wid iumnen, ugaden t; eoan ar neppa d tidep. Ih, wid icukken deg imir, haaten, war ccekk, di ttelfan u$miq
Oebbi d Laiif i imdanen iS. Ip$iti win i S ihwan. Neppa d Uohid, d Uzmir
Win ib$an tayerza n laxeot, ad as Nernu di tyerza ines. Win ib$an tayerza n ddunit, ad as Nefk segs. Ur as illi umur di laxeot
Ne$ saan icriken, sse$oen ten di ddin ur Iqbil Oebbi? Lemmer ur d izwir ara wawal n ufraz, a p fru garasen. I imednas, war ccekk, aaaqeb aqeoean

A pwaliv imednas feqaen ilmend n wayen kesben, u neppa iddehm ed fellasen. Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad ilin di tebeirin n leonanat. Nnsen i sen ihwan $uo Mass nnsen. D wagi ay d lfevl ameqwoan
